```{=html}
<script>
  // Sample blog post data
  const blogPosts = [
    { title: "Understanding Machine Learning Models", date: "2025-02-14", link: "blog/machine-learning.qmd" },
    { title: "The Future of Data Science", date: "2025-01-20", link: "blog/data-science-future.qmd" },
    { title: "Exploring Environmental Data", date: "2025-01-05", link: "blog/environmental-data.qmd" },
    { title: "Genetic Algorithms Explained", date: "2024-12-15", link: "blog/genetic-algorithms.qmd" },
    { title: "Data Visualization Best Practices", date: "2024-11-30", link: "blog/data-visualization.qmd" },
     { title: "Assignment IV: Mars and Channels", date: "2025-02-17", link: "/_site/blog/marks_and_channel.html" }
  ];

  // Function to display blog posts sorted by date
  function displayLatestPosts() {
    blogPosts.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date) - new Date(a.date));
    const latestPostsDiv = document.getElementById('latest-posts');
    let postsHtml = '<ul>';
    blogPosts.forEach(post => {
      postsHtml += `<li><a href="${post.link}">${post.title}</a> - ${post.date}</li>`;
    });
    postsHtml += '</ul>';
    latestPostsDiv.innerHTML = postsHtml;
  }

  // Display latest posts on page load
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', displayLatestPosts);
</script>
```
:::
